extendedInfo.description: After long cold winter bear just awake. he was very starved.Suddenly he found a honeycomb which hanging under big tree and trampoline.We must help the bear to catch honeycomb well. use balloon and beecharacteristic- Whenever catch the honeycomb, our qute bear dance- easy game control just touch anywhere you want to jump.- This game can be played  from young to old- 9 mission add fun play- stage will be added regulary

reviews.title: Stupid game
reviews.comment: This is not cool stupid game crashed my phone dont ever instal this app waste of time and words
reviews.author: Hael Yumul

reviews.title: Adorable but not very fun...
reviews.comment: I wanted to love this. The animations are well done, it is cute, i love that he is running and flying through the sky trying to spear honeycombs with a fork...everything is very well done...except the controls. Those are frustrating and decidedly unfun, especially when they don\'t seem to respond a quarter of the time. 3 stars for the animation and design.
reviews.author: Mars R
